# GRAPHICS::USE_SNOW_WHEEL_VFX_WHEN_UNSHELTERED

## Summary
When the car is unsheltered all wheel effects will use the snow vfx group

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enable

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Forces vehicle trails on all surfaces.
